element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm applies an affine transformation to all the geometries of a given vector layer.

element.name: DISTANCEX
element.text: The distance for translation along the X axis

element.name: DISTANCEY
element.text: The distance for translation along the Y axis

element.name: SCALEX
element.text: The scale factor along the X axis

element.name: SCALEY
element.text: The scale factor along the X axis

element.name: ANCHORX
element.text: The X coordinate of the location of the anchor point for rotation

element.name: ANCHORY
element.text: The X coordinate of the location of the anchor point for rotation
